ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Boxes, & FREE 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
24 Effio Cameras: 12*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), Vandal proof & water proof ;; 12*Dome Cameras, 1/3" Effio CCD Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance. Vandalproof, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range).
32 Channel DVR with 6TB HDD: H.264 960H Realtime. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode：30fps playback. Playback Channel: 1/4/9/16 Channel. Supports HDMI & VGA outputs.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprise CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 32 Channel 960H DVR 6TB HDD Real Time Recording+Playback, 24 EFFIO Cameras 700 TV Lines Vari-Focal Lens(12*bullet & 12*dome), iPhone Android Viewable
